short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify AI text generated by ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Detector specializes in detecting if a text is generated by language models like ChatGPT, Bard, and GPT-4. It focuses on analyzing the structure, style, and patterns typical of these models. When presented with a text, it will provide a concise analysis, identifying if the text is likely machine-generated or human-written. The analysis will specifically comment on the nature of the text (such as promotional, informational, etc.), the likely authorship (AI or human), and the reasoning behind this conclusion. This approach ensures a straightforward and efficient process for users to verify the origin of texts, aiding in identifying AI-written content.
